Question: In May 1968, while his wife was on holiday in Greece, this person invited Ono to visit.
Hints: This person revealed a rebellious nature and acerbic wit in his music, writing, drawings, on film and in interviews.
This person was taken to the emergency room of nearby Roosevelt Hospital and was pronounced dead on arrival at 11:07 pm.
This person, jealous by nature, eventually grew possessive and often terrified Powell with his anger and physical violence.
